physDesc.p: There are also a number of emendations and additions by the Tremulous Hand of Worcester.

handNote.p: Main scribe of the manuscript and of Hatton 113.
reviser. Uses signe-de-renvoi ':'; '·I·'; flagged top wedges; heads of e often open, tongue extravagant; dotted ẏ; wavy abbrev. stroke; bellies of þ and ƿ pointing upwards
